titles.title: An original resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures for the Committee on Appropriations.

calendar.text: Committee on Appropriations ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Stennis. With written report No. 100-221.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-227.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 448.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-22. Record Vote No: 417.

bill.summary: 11/13/1987--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 80, 100th Congress, to increase the authorized expenditures of the Senate Committee on Appropriations, including amounts which may be expended for the procurement of consultants.
